note_content: Client expressed significant hopelessness about the future. When discussing chronic pain, stated 'Sometimes I think everyone would be better off without me.' Clarified that he has no intention of acting on this thought and no plans. Describes it as a fleeting thought that passes. Occurs once or twice a month during pain flares. Exploring referral to pain management clinic.
test_type: Passive SI with perceived burdensomeness, low frequency
